alert.note: Alert for Susitna Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 3:49PM AKST until December 27 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM SUNDAY TO MIDNIGHT AKST SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and Freezing rain expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 10 inches north of Talkeetna. Ice accumulations up to one quarter of an inch possible from Talkeetna south. * WHERE...Susitna Valley. * WHEN...From 3 AM Sunday to midnight AKST Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Holiday travel could be extremely hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of light snow will begin tonight. Snow will then transition to freezing rain during the day Sunday from south to north. Precipitation may transition back to snow Sunday evening. Precipitation to the north of Talkeetna is expected to remain all snow throughout this event.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
